name: Mike
introduction: Hi, have you seen my robot? It seems to have gone astray...

responses.BigShoe: Those would fit me I think.
responses.SmallShoe: Sorry, bit too small for me.

responses.Lipstick: Erm no I do not wear lipstick...

noneResponses: Sorry I have some marking to get on with.
